text: Marcus Osmond Smart (born March 6, 1994) is an American professional basketball player. He plays for the Boston Celtics of the National Basketball Association (NBA). He played college basketball for the Oklahoma State Cowboys before being drafted with the sixth overall pick in the 2014 NBA draft. He was born in Lancaster, Texas. In March 2020, during the 2019â€“20 coronavirus pandemic, Smart tested positive to COVID-19. By the end of the month, he was given the all-clear. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:African-American basketball players Category:American basketball players Category:Boston Celtics players Category:Memphis Grizzlies players Category:Point guards Category:Shooting guards Category:Sportspeople from Texas Category:Washington Wizards players
title: Marcus Smart
